content:
wanted to ping y'all to ask for some feedback, as the Contributors Experience UX WG is currently looking at how the Dataverse documentation can be improved. would love to hear about what you struggle with most (writing style? content structure & finding stuff?), both as new/old contributors, and as technical/non-technical users.

we're also meeting today at 15:00 UTC+1 (google meet link is on the shared calendar), and every second Friday thereafter. feel free to join, we'd love your feedback!
That reminds me... We should check in with @Ceilyn Boyd about this issue: Initiative: Improve Dataverse Documentation #177 - https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-pm/issues/177
At the moment, this initiative is on our wish list. We don't have a timetable to start working on it.
Well, this working group plans to hack a bit on a new guide. Please see #ux-wg > Contributor Guide
